svg:text.svg:tspan: Lots of people think Shakespeare’s the hardest thing you have to study for English — there are definitely
some tricky bits to deal with, but it should be less hard and less weird when you’ve read this section

happening and how the people would and — it should all start to make a lot more sense

so it’s to rely on them too much

Don’t forget that ‘Macbeth’ was written to be performed...
Plays like don’t have loads of description When you read it, you’ll need to think about how the
characters might move and speak on stage Stage directions can sometimes give you a clue
